"Cancer Sucks, But We Can Beat It!" - A social media campaign
"Cancer Research: A Global Effort" - A virtual walk/run event with live streaming and social media sharing.
"Cancer Sucks, But We Can Make a Difference" - A crowdfunding campaign with a focus on individual stories of survival and hope.
"Cancer Research: A Team Effort" - A charity auction with don and volunteer-run events.
"Cancer Sucks, But We Can Make a Change" - A mobile app with games and challenges to raise awareness and funds for cancer research.
